means: 和…约会（tryst的现在分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: Thisbe stole out and arrived first at the trysting - place.
sentence.Network_cn: 提斯柏偷偷溜了出来,先到达了约会地点.

list.abs: one of the very first was paris hilton' s then boyfriend rick salomon , who in 2004 brought a night-vision tape of their tryst to red light district video .其中的第一是帕里斯希尔顿当时的男友里克萨洛蒙，在2004年带来了他们在红灯区幽会的夜视录影带视频。
now go to thy tryst !现在去赴你的约会吧！
Now go to thy tryst !, 现在去赴你的约会吧!
even after her father's suicide , Yang Lijuan insists that her a personal tryst with Lau .杨父的自杀丝毫没有动摇她要与刘德华私人约会的决心。
a clandestine tryst ;, 偷偷的私下约会.

auth_sentence.content: Our trysting place was an isolated cottage not far from Bury St. Edmunds, in Suffolk.
